overview: Collection of three short films from Nova. "That Boy Next Door" — That bright-eyed, well-hung little stud from next door sure wishes he could climb aboard his humpy neighbor! Little does he know his wishes are about to come true when he is discovered swimming naked! "Come Ashore" — Hard up after a long sixteen weeks of sea duty, this humpy sailor is ready to "come ashore!" It doesn't take long before he finds just the hot-mouthed, tight-assed young stud who is more than willing to take care of all his problems! "Roommates Wanted" — A couple of hard-up young studs sharing a house decide it is time to bring in another guy, to share not only expenses but some fun and games as well! What they get is not one but TWO horny young studs whose fast, hot, hard action is more than the householders expected, and almost more than they can take!
title: That Boy Next Door
